author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Saga names Patrick O'Sullivan as new chairman
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - Saga Plc:
* ‍APPOINTMENT OF PATRICK O‘SULLIVAN AS CHAIRMAN​
* ‍APPOINTMENT OF PATRICK O‘SULLIVAN AS CHAIRMAN WITH EFFECT FROM 1 MAY 2018.​
* ‍PATRICK IS HUGELY EXPERIENCED IN GROWING BUSINESSES IN FINANCIAL SERVICES AND INSURANCE INDUSTRY. HE HAS BEEN CHAIRMAN OF OLD MUTUAL PLC, FTSE 100 DIVERSIFIED FINANCIAL SERVICES CONGLOMERATE, SINCE JANUARY 2010.​
* APPOINTMENT OF PATRICK O‘SULLIVAN AS CHAIRMAN
* APPOINTMENT OF PATRICK O‘SULLIVAN AS CHAIRMAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By UK Bureau)
